title: Presenting, "Dream Crushed" (A PESU Manga)!
content:
I have my Mechanics ESA tommorow. So naturally, I was looking for a way to kill time. Ended up drawing a few manga panels. Yes, it's on the back of my Mechanics notebook. I don't know what I was thinking when I drew it (was definitely high on something). I just made a panel layout and drew whatever would fit in each panel. It ended up looking pretty good for a mindless, time pass sketch. I thought the title "Dream Crushed (Dore-Ä«mu Kurusshu)" was pretty fitting lol. Posting it here, so it may be engrained in the PESU Memes Hall fo Fame.

P.S.: Best of luck to everyone who has ESAs ongoing right now!
